mapper.update:
update resume
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resumename = #{resumename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatarurl = #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skills = #{skills,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
selfevaluation = #{selfevaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schoolname = #{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
graduationtime = #{graduationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
majorclass = #{majorclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certificate = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
awards = #{awards,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
campusexp = #{campusexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jobapplied = #{jobapplied,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cityapplied = #{cityapplied,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

jobendtime = #{jobendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update resume set openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resumename = #{resumename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatarurl = #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skills = #{skills,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, selfevaluation = #{selfevaluation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schoolname = #{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graduationtime = #{graduationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, majorclass = #{majorclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certificate = #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, awards = #{awards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, campusexp = #{campusexp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobapplied = #{jobapplied,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityapplied = #{cityapplied,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wageapplied = #{wageapplied,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frequencyapplied = #{frequencyapplied,jdbcType=INTEGER}, durationapplied = #{durationapplied,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entrytime = #{entrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, companyname = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobname = #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jobdesc = #{jobdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = now(), jobstarttime = #{jobstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jobendtime = #{jobendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) from resume WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select from resume where id in (select reid from resdeliverstatus left join joboffers on resdeliverstatus.joid=joboffers.id where joboffers.companyid=#{companyid})
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM resdeliverstatus left join joboffers on resdeliverstatus.joid = joboffers.id and joboffers.companyid= #{companyid} and resdeliverstatus.reid = #{id}
